EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward onto the right career path
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.StepFwd_Associate_first_name_confirm__c},
With exam season nearly over we know that your mind must be on your next step.
If you want to gain invaluable employment skills that will make you stand out from the crowd (and have fun along the way) then Step Forward could be what you are looking for.
Key Facts about the Step Forward Apprenticeship scheme:
Gain a professional qualification to kick-start your career ​​Six different pathways, including Hospitality, IT and Early Years Education Free of charge if you start before turning 19 Get paid a £9000 salary Mix with young people from different backgrounds on personal development and social action projects Fully supported programme with mentors and tutors 1 year long, starting September
We still have limited places for September 2016 starts, so get in touch today to find out more!
Call today on 0203 793 7333 or email step.forward@the-challenge.org
www.stepforward.uk.com
